4XXError.Name: 4xx_error
4XXError.Help: The number of client-side errors captured

5XXError.Name: 5xx_error
5XXError.Help: The number of server-side errors captured

CacheHitCount.Name: cache_hit_count
CacheHitCount.Help: The number of requests served from the API cache

CacheMissCount.Name: cache_miss_count
CacheMissCount.Help: The number of requests served from the backend

IntegrationLatency.Name: integration_latency
IntegrationLatency.Help: The time between when API Gateway relays a request to the backend and when it receives a response from the backend

Latency.Name: latency
Latency.Help: The time between when API Gateway receives a request from a client and when it returns a response to the client
